name: Veekzi
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues influence; Island Creole borrowings
tide-honoring festivals tied to fishing cycles
diet: salt-preserved fish, seaweed, herb-smoked meats
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: near-medieval to early-industrial tech with localized ritual reliance
small coastal outpost serving island routes and reagent transshipment
